sen.j: 玉田宿禰（たまだのすくね、生年不詳 - 允恭天皇5年（416年））、紀元5世紀ごろの葛城氏の豪族。
sen.e: Tamada no sukune (year of birth unknown - 416) was the head of a local ruling family descended from the Katsuragi clan, who lived around the fifth century of the Christian era.
Tamada no sukune (year of birth unknown - 416) was a member of local ruling family belonging to the Katsuragi clan in around the fifth century A.D.
sen.cmt: 「当主」とは記載されていないので、"head"を"member"に変更しました。紀元5世紀ごろに→in around the fifth century A.D.（"in"を挿入し、「紀元」を"A.D."に変更しました。）
sen.e: Tamada no sukune (year of birth unknown - 416) was a member of local ruling family belonging to the Katsuragi clan in around the fifth century A.D.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 『日本書紀』によると、允恭天皇5年(416年)7月14日、玉田宿禰は反正天皇の遺体の管理を命ぜられていたが、地震（記録された日本での初めての地震）があったにも関わらず遺体の安置場所に集まらなかった。
sen.e: According to "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), Tamada no sukune was ordered to guard the deceased Emperor Hanzei's body, however, he did not appear at the due place where the body was enshrined, even when there was an earthquake (the first earthquake recorded in Japan).

According to "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), although he had been ordered to guard the deceased Emperor Hanzei's body, Tamada no sukune did not appear at a place where the body was enshrined on August 23, 416 even though an earthquake (the first earthquake recorded in Japan) occurred.
sen.cmt: 允恭天皇5年(416年)7月14日→August 23, 416（訳抜けしていたので、補いました。）（～命ぜられていた）が、→although（"although"で始まる文章に変更しました。）
sen.e: According to "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), although he had been ordered to guard the deceased Emperor Hanzei's body, Tamada no sukune did not appear at a place where the body was enshrined on August 23, 416 even though an earthquake (the first earthquake recorded in Japan) occurred.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 允恭天皇は尾張連吾襲に調査を命じるが、玉田宿禰は当日酒宴を催していたこともあって、事件を隠蔽しようと尾張連吾襲を殺し、武内宿禰の墓所に逃げ込んだ。
sen.e: Emperor Ingyo ordered Owari Muraji no Aso (Aso of Owari Muraji group) to investigate the case, however, Tamada no sukune killed Owari Muraji no Aso to cover up the fact that he was having a drinking party on the day of the earthquake, and escaped into the graveyard of TAKENOUCHI no Sukune.
sen.cmt: 尾張連吾襲 (おわりむらじのあそ)→Owari Muraji no Aso (Aso of Owari Muraji group)としました。
sen.e: Although the Emperor Ingyo ordered Owari Muraji no Aso (Aso of Owari Muraji group) to investigate the case, Tamada no sukune killed Owari Muraji no Aso to cover up the case because he had held a drinking party on that day, and fled into the graveyard of TAKENOUCHI no Sukune.
sen.cmt: （～命じる）が、→although（"although"で始まる文章に変更しました。）
sen.e: Although the Emperor Ingyo ordered Owari Muraji no Aso (Aso of Owari Muraji group) to investigate the case, Tamada no sukune killed Owari Muraji no Aso to cover up the case because he had held a drinking party on that day, and fled into the graveyard of TAKENOUCHI no Sukune.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 允恭天皇は玉田宿禰を呼び出し、武装しているのを見つけ、これを誅した。
sen.e: Emperor Ingyo summoned Tamada no sukune, and when the Emperor saw that Tamada no sukune was bearing arms, he killed the criminal.
sen.cmt: これを誅した→killed the criminalとしました。
sen.e: The Emperor Ingyo summoned Tamada no sukune, and when finding that Tamada no sukune was armed, the Emperor killed him.
sen.cmt: これを誅した→killed him（文脈より、「これ」は、玉田宿禰を指しているので、"him"としました。）
sen.e: The Emperor Ingyo summoned Tamada no sukune, and when finding that Tamada no sukune was armed, the Emperor killed him.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 『古事記』には玉田宿禰の記述はない。
sen.e: In "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), there is no description about Tamada no sukune.
The "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) had no descriptions about Tamada no sukune.
sen.cmt: 古事記を主語にして、簡潔な表現にしました。
sen.e: The "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) had no descriptions about Tamada no sukune.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 葛城襲津彦（かつらぎのそつひこ）が父または祖父（日本書紀には両方の記述があって矛盾している。公卿補任によれば父）。
sen.e: KATSURAGI no Sotsuhiko was his father or his grandfather (within the Nihonshoki there are inconsistent descriptions).
sen.cmt: 「（日本書紀には両方の記述があって矛盾している。公卿補任によれば父）」を下列に移動しました。日本書紀→the Nihonshoki
sen.e: His father or grandfather was KATSURAGI no Sotsuhiko (the Nihonshoki had both descriptions which were inconsistent, and the Kugyobunin (directory of court nobles) mentioned that KATSURAGI no Sotsuhiko was his father).
sen.cmt: 後述の「（日本書紀には両方の記述があって矛盾している。公卿補任によれば父）」を含めて、一つの文章となるので、下から上に移動しました。
sen.e: His father or grandfather was KATSURAGI no Sotsuhiko (the Nihonshoki had both descriptions which were inconsistent, and the Kugyobunin (directory of court nobles) mentioned that KATSURAGI no Sotsuhiko was his father).
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 息子は葛城円（かつらぎのつぶら）。
sen.e: KATSURAGI no Tsubura was his son.
His son was KATSURAGI no Tsubura.
sen.cmt: 「玉田宿禰」に関する項目なので、"his son"を主語にしました。
sen.e: His son was KATSURAGI no Tsubura.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: (according to the Kugyobunin).
sen.cmt: 公卿補任→the Kugyobunin
sen.e: (source: Kugyobunin)
sen.cmt: ～による→source:（出典を指しているので、"source:"としました。）
sen.e: (source: Kugyobunin)
sen.cmt: 修正なし
